location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire to Captain M E Bagnold, Acting Field Paymaster, Bassidore [Bāsaʻīdū]

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a bill of lading and receipt (not present) for cash being supplied aboard the HC Cruizer Mercuryto meet the demands of the Pay Department for British forces at Bassidore [Bāsaʻīdū]. It further discusses arrangements for bills negotiated at Bushire for the purpose of providing this cash.
